title: Pollution à Montauban
text:
Code
# import pandas as pd
# import matplotlib.dates as mdates
# import matplotlib.pyplot as plt
# import plotly.express as px
# import plotly.graph_objects as go
from Month import *
from Horloge import *

data = pd.read_csv("Mesure_horaire_(30j)_Region_Occitanie_Polluants_Reglementaires.csv")

station = 'Montauban - Ramierou Urbain'

Trace_go(data,station,'Montauban')

Horloge_semaine(data, station)

Horloge_weekend(data,station)
